mapper.update: update SYS_ROLE set ROLECODE = #{rolecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLENAME = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=CHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_SYS_ROLE = #{pkSysRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_SYS_ROLE, ROLECODE, ROLENAME, CREATEUSER, DR, TS, REMARK from SYS_ROLE
select PK_SYS_ROLE, ROLECODE, ROLENAME, CREATEUSER, DR, TS, REMARK from SYS_ROLE
select PK_SYS_ROLE, ROLECODE, ROLENAME, CREATEUSER, DR, TS, REMARK from SYS_ROLE WHERE ROLECODE = #{rolecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
